body.p:
Columbus, Hickman Co
Kentucky Aug. 23rd, 1865.
A. J. James Esqr.
Frankfort, Ky.
Dr Sir:

Enclosed is a letter from our mutual friend Mr. Jno. C. Glenn, my object is, to procure a commission for a notary public, I am agent with full powers of attorney for four heirs of Baker Woodruff, decd with business of others of a similar nature, the lands lying in this town and in several different counties, in the progress of my business I am often checked for want of notarial power in executing papers, such as simply require stamps or seals for perfection &c I am no lawyer, but have employed several in and out of this state since my residence here which dates from 1859. Mr. Glenn has made me fully acquainted with you as a practitioner & when occasion requires shall be happy to confer with you in the line of your business.

Very respty. Yours,
Geo. S. Badger

Notary Public
Hickman Co
Geo S. Badger
